attributes.action: I would like to suggest a Global ceasefire day (war and terror)
attributes.background: I do not know figures but just one day without people killing each other should save many people.

rejection.details:
Your petition seems to be calling on all countries, not just the UK, to take this action.

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to work with the governments of other countries to achieve a global ceasefire.
